title: friday night crystal scar tournament
body:
Relay at crystal scar .....if you look at map its easy to see how relay runners will be positioned. Killing not allowed but cc is .only level up one point in each ability. Picks are draft so you can ban hec/rammus/zilean etc. Only allowed to buy boots and potions not elixirs. No flaming. No trolls.(panth tf shen..ults banned its gotta be a race )And lastly have heaps of fun (summoners :ghost and exhaust have proven themselves)

TL;DR relay race crystal scar sounds pretty cool just dont be troll
